readable.content: A girl in black sitting on a man 's lap on a subway . A girl sitting on a man 's lap on a passenger train A man and woman sit together on public transportation . A woman is sitting on a man 's lap on a public transportation system . A woman with a ponytail dressed in jean shorts and a black tank top sitting on the lap of a man with camo shorts and a white shirt on a subway .
